overview: Tis the season for terrorizing your neighbors.  And these classic Beavis and Butt-head episodes have tricks and treats so sweet you'll get a stomachache.  Includes:  Bungholio: Lord of the Harvest,  The Pipe of Doom,  Killing Time,  Leave it to Beavis,  Ding-Dong-Ditch,  Late Night with Butt-head,  Candy Sale
tagline: Seven cartoons so scary you'll laugh your nads off.
title: Beavis and Butt-head: Butt-O-Ween
